peregrine.http
Class HttpWriteForwardWriter

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.http.HttpClient
      peregrine.http.HttpClientWriter
          peregrine.http.HttpPutMethod
              peregrine.http.HttpWriteForwardWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, ChannelBufferWritable
public class HttpWriteForwardWriter
extends HttpPutMethod

HTTP PUT implementation that uses write forwarding to also write data to secondary hosts.
